title: Freezing/Crashing
body: When I get into game, my screen freezes and makes a buzzing noise. Everything else works fine, the launcher, the client, and I can spectate games, but as soon as I enter one, the whole game freezes, and the only way I can fix it is to turn off/restart my computer

replies.body: I removed the Xbox app altogether and am still seeing freezes every game!
Just disable the game dvr, it worked for me
It worked for me, thank you!

The buzzing and freezing seems to be due to a recent Windows 10 update issue.  Specifically, the culprit may be with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disabling this should get you fixed up!

Hello, do you happen to use Windows 10 with a fresh W10 Anniversary update? If yes, please try the following:

To turn off the Game DVR feature in the Windows 10, please do the following:

Open the Xbox app by going to the Search bar on the bottom left of the screen and typing "Xbox"
Click on the Settings (Gear) icon on the left.
Click on Game DVR at the top.
Click on the On/Off (switch) under "Record game clips and screenshots using Game DVR" to turn it off. (it should be gray and set to "Off")
